alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Clinch; Echols; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 11:10PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Columbia, northwestern Suwannee, Hamilton, west central Camden, Echols, southwestern Brantley, central Ware, central Clinch and northern Charlton Counties through MIDNIGHT EST... At 1110 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Stephen Foster State Park to near Blue Springs. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, Fargo, Statenville, Suwannee River State Park, Stephen Foster State Park, Crossroads, Race Pond, Fort Mudge and Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Clinch; Echols; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
